The story is set in Manchester, when the snow falls and everyone is preparing for Christmas. All except Anthony (Eddie Izzard), a strange and enigmatic who wakes up in the middle of the street, not knowing where you are or what you're doing there, but Anthony has a remarkable ability: the power to find the lost, Anthony transforms life five ordinary people whose lives have been shattered by their past decisions. But Anthony capacity to heal is real or just an illusion?
